txt.en: 'On the behalf of all the Avorrim, thank you for returning these relics, my friend. And thank you for passing on Dolvir's message -- I look forward to seeing him again.\n\n'You are welcome to linger in the garden for as long as you'd like.'

'During the war, one of my scouts, Dolvir, helped rescue Elf-relics from the Corsairs in Edhellond. He intended to return the relics to the Elves, but alas, he has not had the time.\n\n'If you find yourself travelling north-west there, would you mind delivering these relics to an Elf named Lathlorn? Ah, along with the following message from Dolvir -- \qMy apologies for the wait. I hope to visit soon.\q'
The scout Dolvir kept a collection of Elf-relics from Edhellond safe during the war. Now that the war has passed, it is time to return them.
Gilanor has asked you to deliver the Elf-relics to Lathlorn in Edhellond.\n\nEdhellond is located to the north-west of Ost Lontir.
